column5: Via Facebook post, Chimo has cancelled the 2021 season due to the fire threat in the area and exposure to the northern outposts. I had alot of hope that our August trip would happen but can certainly understand their decision and pray that they, and all the other outfitters, can weather this additional setback.
Their Keeper River Outpost was torched also. The only silver lining is another new cabin like what they did at Roderrick as what Peter left them were tired cabins.
looks to me that the fires have hit Roderick Lake and the Pine Island outpost cabin is in the fire zone... Also the portage lake boats will be toast

I got a call from Chimo yesterday and she said they were opening there northern camps Aug 9th and wanted to know if I was interested for this year only.....but I am already booked elsewhere. There might be an option for anyone looking...
